entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
